item.title: Cristina add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "tambien de este modo como el destino acostumbra a comportarse con nosotros, ya esta pisandonos los talones, ya extendio la mano para tocarnos en el hombro, y nosotros todavia vamos murmurando, Se acabo, no hay nada mas que ver, todo es igual" -- José Saramago

item.title: Cristina add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Y esa isla desconocida, si la encuentras sera para mi, a ti rey, solo te interesan las islas conocidas." -- José Saramago

item.title: Cristina add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "SI NO SALES DE TI ,NO LLEGAS A SABER QUIEN ERES. CONSIDERO QUE ESTAR, ENCERRADO EN TI MISMO Y NO MIRAR A TU ALREDEDOR,TE ALEJA DE LA REALIDAD NO PERMITIENDOTE VIVIR." -- José Saramago

item.title: Cristina add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "........pero quiero encontrar la isla desconocida, quiero saber quien soy you cuando este en ella. No lo sabes, Si no sales de ti, no llegas a saber quien eres....." -- José Saramago

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "Colorful demonstrations and weekend marches are vital but alone are not powerful enough to stop wars. Wars will be stopped only when soldiers refuse to fight, when workers refuse to load weapons onto ships and aircraft, when people boycott the economic outposts of Empire that are strung across the globe. " -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Antonio Machado
item.description:
"Wanderer, your footsteps are the road, and nothing more; wanderer, there is no road, the road is made by walking. By walking one makes the road, and upon glancing behind one sees the path that never will be trod again. Wanderer, there is no road-- Only wakes upon the sea.
Caminante, son tus huellas el camino, y nada más; caminante, no hay camino, se hace camino al andar. Al andar se hace camino, y al volver la vista atrás se ve la senda que nunca se ha de volver a pisar. Caminante, no hay camino, sino estelas en la mar." -- Antonio Machado

item.title: Cristina add a quote by zora neale hurston
item.description: "one finds great comfort in good dinners" -- zora neale hurston

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Okakura Kakuzo
item.description: "Those who cannot feel the littleness of great things in themselves are apt to overlook the greatness of little things in others." -- Okakura Kakuzo

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Tao Te Ching
item.description:
"
Knowing others is wisdom; knowing the self is enlightenment.
Tao Te Ching" -- Tao Te Ching

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Tao Te-Ching
item.description: "To hold, you must first open your hand. Let go" -- Tao Te-Ching

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things, does the heart find its morning and is refreshed." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Cristina add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair" -- Khalil Gibran
